attributes.action: Refund our student fees for this year University Students
attributes.additional_details: Technological issues have led us to missing out on education at home especially those with weaker internet connection That has affected our studies mental health anxiety caused suicidal effects and depression. How we students meant to focus with all of this going on and yet paying £9k. So many students struggling finding it hard to cope teachers not always available internet issues laptop issues lack of resources yet no change to the student funding this is not equality!!!
attributes.background: We as University students are eligible for a refund for this academic year because we haven’t attended university much this year odd few days here and there with constant back to back lockdowns.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516
